table.title: Temperature Warnings for $form.deviceSN$
table.searchString: index=extnet sourcetype=log Temperature | rex max_match=0 "<Erro:DM\.Error>\sSwitch:\sTemperature\s\((?<curTemp>(\d+|-\d+)\sC)\)\s(is\sreaching\s(?<tempReaching>(maximum|minimum))\slimit|above\soperating\srange)\s\((?<tempLimit>(\d+|-\d+|-\d+\sto\s\d+)\sCelsius)\)(\.|)\s\((?<deviceName>\S+),\sP\/N:\s(?<deviceType>\S+),\sS\/N:\s(?<deviceSN>\S+),\sRev:\s(?<deviceRev>\d+\.\d+)\)" | search curTemp=* deviceSN=$form.deviceSN$ | eval eventTime=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval tempReaching=if(tempReaching="minimum" OR tempReaching="maximum",tempReaching,"ABOVE RANGE") | dedup _time,deviceSN,tempReaching | table eventTime,deviceSN,deviceName,host,curTemp,tempReaching,tempLimit | sort -eventTime | rename eventTime as "Event Time" deviceSN as "Device SN" deviceName as "Device Model" host as "Host" curTemp as "Current Temperature" tempReaching as "Temperature Approaching" tempLimit as "Temperature Limit"
